title: Transaction Form Successful Submission
description: Verify that a transaction is successfully submitted with valid inputs and appears at the top of the transactions table with form reset and success confirmation.

steps.description: Open the expense tracker dashboard page
Fill the transaction form using today's date, positive amount, label, select a primary category and valid dynamic subcategory
Submit the transaction form
Check form validation passes with no errors
Verify the new transaction appears instantly at the top of the entries table
Confirm the form resets to default values and success confirmation is displayed

title: Transaction Form Field Validation Errors
description: Check that the transaction form displays inline validation errors when required fields are missing, amount is zero/negative, or date is future with user feedback.

steps.description: Open the dashboard and leave the date field empty
Click submit
Validate required field error is shown for date
Enter a zero amount and submit
Validate inline positive amount error is shown
Enter a date in the future and submit
Confirm a warning message about future date is displayed

title: Dynamic Subcategory Options Reflect Selected Primary Category
description: Verify that selecting a primary category updates the subcategory dropdown with corresponding predefined options and handles rapid category changes gracefully.

steps.description: Select 'Income' as primary category in the transaction form
Subcategory dropdown lists only Income subcategories: Salary, Freelance, Other
Change primary category quickly to Fixed Expense, then Variable Expense
Subcategory updates smoothly without errors to Fixed Expense then Variable Expense subcategories

title: Period Filter Presets and Custom Date Range Update Transactions and KPIs
description: Ensure that selecting period filter presets or entering custom date ranges instantly filters displayed transactions, updates KPI cards, and visual charts correspondingly.

steps.description: Select 'This Month' preset period filter
Entries table shows only transactions within this month
KPI cards recalculate totals matching filtered data within ±1 currency tolerance
Trend chart and category donut chart update data consistent with filtered transactions
Enter a custom date range with start and end dates
All displayed transactions and KPIs update as expected

title: Empty State Display When No Transactions Match Filter
description: Verify that when filtered period has no transactions, the entries table shows a dark mode friendly empty state message with guidance for the user.

steps.description: Apply a period filter with a date range that matches no transactions
Empty table state is shown with dark theme styling and user guidance text

title: Table Performance and Pagination with 200+ Entries
description: Confirm that the entries table remains performant, renders smoothly, and uses pagination or staged loading strategies when handling over 200 transaction entries.

steps.description: Load or add 200+ transaction entries
Table renders without lag or freezing
Pagination or staged loading controls appear and function correctly
Navigate through pagination controls or trigger staged loading
Transactions load smoothly with correct data displayed

title: KPI Card Accuracy for Total Income, Expenses, Savings, and Leftover
description: Verify KPI card calculations correctly sum and display total income, total expenses, amount saved, and leftover balances for filtered periods matching manual calculations within ±1 currency unit.

steps.description: Apply period filters with known transactions sums including income and expenses
Check total income value on KPI card matches manual summation within ±1 tolerance
Check total expenses KPI card matches manual sum within ±1 tolerance
Check amount saved and leftover KPI values are correctly calculated and displayed

title: Trend and Category Donut Charts Data Accuracy and Tooltip Accessibility
description: Ensure that the time-series trend chart and category donut chart render accurate, accessible data reflecting filtered transactions, provide tooltips showing precise values, and visually integrate with the dark mode theme.

steps.description: Apply a period filter with known transactions
Trend chart accurately displays weekly income vs. expenses time-series data
Category donut chart proportionally represents expense distribution by category
Hover or focus on chart segments
Tooltips display correct and precise data values
Charts use dark mode palette colors and are clearly visible with sufficient contrast

title: Responsive Layout and Dark Mode Accessibility on Different Viewports
description: Validate that the dashboard layout maintains usability and readability with no horizontal scroll or overflow on viewport widths 320px, 375px, 768px, and 1440px and that the dark mode theme meets contrast ratio ≥4.5:1 for text and UI elements.

steps.description: Resize viewport or test on devices with widths: 320px, 375px, 768px, and 1440px
Verify no horizontal scroll and no UI overlap or content cutoff
Check all text and interactive elements meet accessible contrast ratio (≥4.5:1) in dark mode theme
Ensure vertical stacked layout is used below 768px viewport width

title: Form Preservation and Inline Error on Incomplete Submission
description: Verify that submitting an incomplete or invalid transaction form does not reset entered data but highlights inputs with errors inline and preserves other valid fields.

steps.description: Fill some fields in the transaction form but omit required ones or enter invalid data
Submit the form
Check that form fields retain user input except fields with errors
Validate inline errors highlight only invalid input fields

title: Handling Edge Cases: Zero or Negative Amounts and Future Dates
description: Test the system's handling of edge case inputs such as zero or negative amounts and future transaction dates, ensuring proper user feedback and preventing erroneous data entry.

steps.description: Attempt to submit a transaction with a zero amount
Form rejects submission and displays respective validation error
Attempt to submit a transaction with a negative amount
Form rejects submission and shows validation error for positive amount enforcement
Attempt to submit a transaction with date set in the future
Display warning about future date but allow submission if business logic permits, or block with error if not

title: Instant Feedback on Filtering Without Page Reload
description: Ensure that applying filters (presets and custom ranges) updates transaction entries, KPIs, and charts instantly without any page reload or flicker.

steps.description: Apply various period filters and custom date ranges consecutively
Entries table, KPI cards, and charts update immediately without page reload
No flickering or UI flash observed during filter changes

title: User Comfort with Dark Theme After Continuous Usage
description: Validate through user surveys or usability testing that at least 90% of pilot users report high comfort and satisfaction using the dark mode theme after daily usage of one week.

steps.description: Conduct pilot user study with daily usage of the app over one week
Collect comfort rating data and verify ≥90% positive feedback on dark theme usability
